text: James Marsters (born August 20, 1962) is an American guitarist, singer, comic book writer, audiobook narrator, and actor. He is known for playing the part of Spike on Buffy the Vampire Slayer. == Other websites == * * James Marsters Official Site Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American television actors Category:Actors from California Category:Musicians from California Category:American blues musicians Category:Country musicians Category:Singers from California
title: James Marsters
